name: Flygon
author: hatachu
flavor_text: This Pokémon hides in the heart of sandstorms it creates and seldom appears where people can see it.

abilities.name: Labyrinth of Sand
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent’s Active Pokémon can’t retreat.

attacks.name: Desert Geyser
attacks.effect: If your opponent has a Stadium in play, discard it. If you discarded a Stadium in this way, during your opponent’s next turn, prevent all damage from and effects of attacks done to this Pokémon.
